summary: Test module that validates the core behavior and performance optimizations of the AnimateDiff pipeline when combined with the PAG (Pixel-Aware Guidance) component. It checks initialization of sub‑models, handling of inputs, attention slicing, noise generation, configuration consistency, compatibility across devices and data types, and optional features such as IP adapters and xformers integration.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and efficiency of the AnimateDiff‑PAG pipeline for production use, preventing regressions and ensuring it works reliably across diverse hardware and configuration scenarios.
